   19: %%
   20: -module(msacc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %% Test server callbacks
   25: -export([suite/0, all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   26: 
   27: %% Test cases
   28: -export([
   29: 	%% API-test
   30: 	api_file/1,
   31:         api_start_stop/1,
   32: 	api_timer/1,
   33:         api_print/1
   34:     ]).
   35: 
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: %% COMMON TEST CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: all() ->
   40:     [
   41:      api_start_stop,
   42:      api_file,
   43:      api_timer,
   44:      api_print
   45:     ].
   46: 
   47: suite() -> [
   48: 	{timetrap,{minutes,1}},
   49: 	{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}
   50:     ].
   51: 
   52: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     try erlang:statistics(microstate_accounting) of
   54:         _ ->
   55:             Config
   56:     catch _:_ ->
   57:             {skip, "Microstate accouning not available"}
   58:     end.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% TEST CASES
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: 
   67: api_timer(_Config) ->
   68: 
   69:     %% Run msacc for about 100ms
   70:     msacc:start(100),
   71: 
   72:     %% Verify that scheduler 1 executed+slept for about 100ms
   73:     [Sched1] = [S || S = #{ type := scheduler, id := 1 } <- msacc:stats()],
   74: 
   75:     #{ counters := Cnt } = Sched1,
   76: 
   77:     %% Time should be in us
   78:     Time = maps:fold(fun(_,V,Acc) -> V + Acc end, 0, Cnt),
   79: 
   80:     if Time < 120000 andalso Time > 80000 -> ok;
   81:        true -> ct:fail({inaccurate_time, Time, msacc:stats()})
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: %% We just do a basic check that none of the apis crash
   85: api_start_stop(_Config) ->
   86:     msacc:start(),
   87:     timer:sleep(100),
   88:     msacc:stop(),
   89:     Runtime = msacc:stats(system_runtime, msacc:stats()),
   90:     Realtime = msacc:stats(system_realtime, msacc:stats()),
   91:     true = Runtime < Realtime,
   92: 
   93:     RuntimeCnt = msacc:stats(runtime, msacc:stats()),
   94:     RealtimeCnt = msacc:stats(realtime, msacc:stats()),
   95:     TypeCnt = msacc:stats(type, msacc:stats()),
   96: 
   97:     %% These should be very similar
   98:     RuntimeTypeCnt = msacc:stats(type, RuntimeCnt),
   99:     TypeRuntimeCnt = msacc:stats(runtime, TypeCnt),
  100:     lists:map(fun({#{ system := T1 },#{ system := T2}}) ->
  101:                       if T1-0.5 < T2 orelse T1+0.5 > T2 -> ok;
  102:                          true -> ct:fail({inaccurate_stats, RuntimeTypeCnt,
  103:                                           TypeRuntimeCnt})
  104:                       end
  105:               end, lists:zip(RuntimeTypeCnt, TypeRuntimeCnt)),
  106: 
  107:     %% These should be very similar
  108:     RealtimeTypeCnt = msacc:stats(type, RealtimeCnt),
  109:     TypeRealtimeCnt = msacc:stats(realtime, TypeCnt),
  110:     lists:map(fun({#{ system := T1 },#{ system := T2}}) ->
  111:                       if T1-0.5 < T2 orelse T1+0.5 > T2 -> ok;
  112:                          true -> ct:fail({inaccurate_stats, RealtimeTypeCnt,
  113:                                           TypeRealtimeCnt})
  114:                       end
  115:               end,lists:zip(RealtimeTypeCnt, TypeRealtimeCnt)),
  116: 
  117:     msacc:reset().
  118: 
  119: api_file(Config) ->
  120:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  121:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "msacc.stats"),
  122:     Stats = msacc:stats(),
  123:     ok = msacc:to_file(File),
  124:     Stats = msacc:from_file(File),
  125: 
  126:     PrintFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "msacc.txt"),
  127:     msacc:print(PrintFile, Stats, #{}).
  128: 
  129: %% We just check that it is possible to print in a couple of different ways
  130: api_print(_Config) ->
  131:     msacc:start(100),
  132:     io:format("msacc:print(msacc:stats()).~n"),
  133:     msacc:print(msacc:stats()),
  134:     io:format("msacc:print(msacc:stats(),#{ system => true }).~n"),
  135:     msacc:print(msacc:stats(), #{ system => true }),
  136:     io:format("msacc:print(msacc:stats(runtime,msacc:stats())).~n"),
  137:     msacc:print(msacc:stats(runtime, msacc:stats())),
  138:     io:format("msacc:print(msacc:stats(type,msacc:stats())).~n"),
  139:     msacc:print(msacc:stats(type, msacc:stats())),
  140:     io:format("msacc:print(msacc:stats(realtime,msacc:stats())).~n"),
  141:     msacc:print(msacc:stats(realtime, msacc:stats())),
  142:     io:format("msacc:stats(type,msacc:stats(runtime,msacc:stats())).~n"),
  143:     msacc:print(msacc:stats(type, msacc:stats(runtime, msacc:stats()))).
